scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server -c blue,green "cd client && vite" "npm run -w server dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:api
scripts.build:api: echo 'API files ready in api/ directory for Vercel serverless functions'
scripts.setup:env: cp server/.env.example server/.env && cp client/.env.example client/.env
scripts.setup:prod: cp server/.env.example server/.env && echo 'Update server/.env with production values' && cp client/.env.example client/.env && echo 'Update client/.env with production VITE_API_URL'
scripts.deploy:help: echo 'Run: bash deploy.sh for interactive deployment guide'
scripts.clean: rm -rf client/dist server/dist client/.env server/.env dist
